news.title: GM, Stellantis shares fall after Trump's auto tariff announcement
news.summary: President Donald Trump said he would place 25% tariffs on "all cars that are not made in the United States" Trump said the cars would have to be made "in the U.S."

news.title: U.S. health department plans to slash 10,000 jobs as RFK Jr. upends agencies
news.summary: Cuts at Robert F. Kennedy Jr.'s Health and Human Services Department could affect teams that respond to outbreaks and help with insurance coverage.

news.title: Oil executives bluntly criticize Trump tariffs and 'drill, baby, drill' in anonymous survey
news.summary: The blunt responses stand in contrast to oil executive public remarks at the industry's big energy conference in Houston. The blunt responses stood in contrast with oil exec public remarks in the past.

news.title: Trump's tariffs push will hit the U.S. harder than Europe in the short term, Santander chair says
news.summary: "On a relative basis, in the short term, Europe will be less affected than the U.S.," Santander's Ana Botín said.

news.title: GameStop shares drop, reversing Wednesday's rally, on planned debt issue to buy bitcoin
news.summary: The latest sell-off came after the video game chain announced plans to raise $1.3 billion through the sale of convertible senior notes to purchase bitcoin.
